name: Normal Human
description:
Can you and your Unstable Alien mind manage to pass as a normal human, and discover the secrets in their halls of learning?

We went a bit off the road with the Theme here, but we're super happy with the end product. We both crunched hard to get to where we got, and despite some roughness in the latter half of content, we're really proud of what was done. Hopefully you enjoy it as well!
